note.p: Merchant and fern enthusiast. Merchant in Leeds, Yorkshire, 1841. Retired wine and spirit merchant, Scarborough, Yorkshire, 1851. Collected and grew ferns.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1348/6/33/30), 1851 (HO107/2368/382/14)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 8 August 2016)
West Yorkshire, England, Church of England baptisms, marriages and burials, 1512–1812 (Ancestry.com, accessed 8 August 2016)
